thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com | 2 of 17
thread.title: Rick

author: Rick
title: Rick
text:
I have used OneSim Plus service for about 2 years and it is a great service. I am retired and travel frequently to Europe, Asia, and many cruises and I rely on this phone service so that my family can contact me in the event of an emergency. I have used other international SIM cards but OneSim Plus always makes the connection with local phone services at reasonable prices for calls, text messages and data.
Wouldn't travel without OneSim Plus.
